entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 11:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
